Summary: it was just a stange glowing/pulsating/clorful object.... but it seemed to affect all electronic devices... cuz my phone started making weird noises..buzzed static which it never does and the street lights seemed to be on the fritz
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Granite City
There were no other sightings in Granite City on or around May 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting Detailslarge triangle shape, pulating colors. could hint a slight outline. seemed about 300 ft in size. no noise just silent pulsating with colors. seemed to interfere with electronics....tried to record but phone seemed to be affected
